## isISO8601Range() function

Determines if the string is an ISO-8601 range style string.

This does not cover the entire 8601 spec, just a version that is commonly used by NLUs to communicate date &amp; time.

[isISO8601()](./stentor-utils.isiso8601.md) [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO\_8601\#Time\_intervals](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Time_intervals)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isISO8601Range(potential: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  potential | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if the string confirms to ISO-8601 range format
